code: import React from'react';import{useTheme}from'../../context/ThemeContext';import styles from'./ThemeToggle.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ThemeToggle=()=>{const{theme,toggleTheme}=useTheme();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:toggleTheme,className:styles.toggle,"data-theme":theme,"aria-label":"Toggle theme",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:`${styles.icon} ${styles.sun}`,children:"\uD83C\uDF1E"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:`${styles.icon} ${styles.moon}`,children:"\uD83C\uDF19"})]});};export default ThemeToggle;
